data.title: J’Accuse! – Greater Phoenix Jewish Film Festival
data.text:
The feature film will be preceded by the short film ANATEVKA.

2023 – 4 minutes – English – Danielle Durchslag

A modern, darkly comedic version of the song from Fiddler on the Roof.

The film will be followed by a speaker. Dr. Ettie Zilber serves on the Board of the Phoenix Holocaust Association and as a docent at the museum of the Arizona Jewish Historical Society. She was born in a Displaced Persons camp in Landsberg, Germany to Lithuanian parents who survived the Holocaust. After Dr. Zilber retired from a career as head administrator in international schools, she researched, documented and published her family’s Holocaust experiences and has lectured at schools, universities and conferences throughout the USA and other countries, including Lithuania and Germany.
